Title.ui:help: Provide a title or name for your data package

Description.ui:help: Describe the data package. Please refer to projects or grants responsible for the data package

Research_Group.ui:help: Specify the research group responsible for the data package

Collection_Name.ui:help: Identification of the Program or Project responsible for collecting the data

Data_Type.ui:help: What is the type of your data

Data_Classification.ui:help: How is your data classified with regards to information security policy

Start_Date.ui:help: Indicate when you've started collecting the data for this data package

End_Date.ui:help: Indicate when you've finished collecting the data for this data package

GeoLocation.ui:description: Specify the location where the data is collected, in an appropriate level of detail in respect to the research type

geoLocationBox.ui:description: Specify the location where the data is collected, in an appropriate level of detail in respect to the research type

Tag.ui:description: Free text field for adding (searchable) key words to your data package

Related_Datapackage.ui:description: Reference to other resources, such as another data package, or an online publication

Persistent_Identifier.ui:help: Persistent identifier of the related resource

Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: Type of Persistent identifier of the related resource

Identifier.ui:help: The identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

Personal_Data.ui:help: Indicate whether the data package contains personal information

Retention_Period.ui:help: The minimum number of years that the data must be kept

Data_Access_Restriction.ui:help: Select how the data should be shared within the faculty of Geosciences. Personal data may only be accessed on request

Contributor.ui:description: Person performing the deposit will also act as first contact person

Given_Name.ui:help: The personal or first name of the person(s) performing the deposit

Family_Name.ui:help: The surname or last name of the person(s) performing the deposit

Contributor_Type.ui:help: The type of contributor. List of values is derived from DataCite

Creator.ui:description: The person(s) within the faculty responsible for collecting the data

Given_Name.ui:help: The personal or first name of the person(s) responsible for collecting the data

Family_Name.ui:help: The surname or last name of the person(s) responsible for collecting the data

Affiliation.ui:description: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the contributor

Owner_Role.ui:help: What is the role of the owner in the data collection

License.ui:help: The license under which you offer the data package for use by third parties. Preferred value is CC BY
